title: MempoolCoinbaseTransaction
description: Describes representation of a Type 3 Stacks 2.0 transaction: Poison Microblock

allOf.description: Abstract transaction. This schema makes up all properties common between all Stacks 2.0 transaction types

nonce.description: Used for ordering the transactions originating from and paying from an account. The nonce ensures that a transaction is processed at most once. The nonce counts the number of times an account's owner(s) have authorized a transaction. The first transaction from an account will have a nonce value equal to 0, the second will have a nonce value equal to 1, and so on.

sponsored.description: Denotes whether the originating account is the same as the paying account

receipt_time.description: A unix timestamp (in seconds) indicating when the transaction broadcast was received by the node.

receipt_time_iso.description: An ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ) timestamp indicating when the transaction broadcast was received by the node.

data.description: Hex encoded 32-byte scratch space for block leader's use
